name: Margaret F. SAMET v. Eugene P. PETIT

parties: Margaret F. SAMET v. Eugene P. PETIT.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari and motion for stay are denied.

attorneys: Joseph A. Capineri, Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Stephen F. Mullen, Chief Special Counsel, Dept, of Transportation, Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
Margaret F. SAMET v. Eugene P. PETIT.
No. 81-66-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
March 19, 1981.
Joseph A. Capineri, Pawtucket, for petitioner.
Stephen F. Mullen, Chief Special Counsel, Dept, of Transportation, Providence, for respondent.
